mapper.select: select * from tblNotice order by seqNotice desc
select count(*) as count from tblNotice

SELECT result1.* FROM (SELECT seqNotice, title, content, image, writeDate, viewCount, LAG(seqNotice, 1, 0) OVER(ORDER BY seqNotice DESC) AS prevNum, LEAD(seqNotice, 1, 0) OVER(ORDER BY seqNotice DESC) AS nextNum FROM tblNotice ORDER BY seqNotice DESC) result1 WHERE seqNotice=#{seqNotice};
mapper.insert: insert into tblNotice (seqNotice, title, content, writeDate, viewCount, image) values (seqNotice.nextVal, #{title}, #{content}, default , default, null)
mapper.update: > update tblNotice set viewCount = #{viewCount} where seqNotice = #{seqNotice}
